ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Re: Problems compiling NEAT C++
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Mikkel, In my experience compiling NEAT with GCC 3.0 and 3.2, adding the line using namespace std; to neat.h solved all the major compile errors. There

Hi Mikkel,

In my experience compiling NEAT with GCC 3.0 and 3.2, adding the line
"using namespace std;" to neat.h solved all the major compile errors.
There were some other problems with the swig code that needed explicit
type casting.  I see that you are using gcc 3.3, but I doubt changes
between 3.2 and 3.3 would cause these errors.  Anyways, I will post the
gcc 3.2 compiled code, so you can try it.

Vinod


On Thu, 11 Mar 2004, mikkel_kjaergaard wrote:

>
